TEXT.BODY: Jan 31 end Shr 31 cts vs 44 cts Net 5,705,000 vs 8,101,000 Revs 50.6 mln vs 67.2 mln 1st half Shr 63 cts vs 71 cts Net 11.6 mln vs 13.2 mln Revs 80.9 mln vs 105.2 mln NOTE: Current half net includes 750,000 dlr charge from reorganization. Reuter
